Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam is great!”
Reviews.Author: Didi1962
Reviews.Content: reviews good slightly fake recently stayed bb bunch stunning reviews hotel thoroughly deserves praise getting doubt find anything better price great part town

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel right in the middle of everything”
Reviews.Author: Pistolpjh
Reviews.Content: fab location right next jardin du luxembourg close several good cafes restaurants le excellent hill opera la next hotel good heart st germain means walking distance great shopping fashion books antiques islands etc large open reception plenty tv front pleasant front house get wifi password check although seemed drop every 15 minutes us room whilst fitted dark tiny mean really tiny kind lots banging heads bed corners tvs fitted rich brown tiles lights bar fridge little room hanging long items like plenty hangers bed high tho suitcase could stored underneath didnt try breakfast went local cafes instead nearby les

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Misscotland
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights hotel du luxembourg whole staff hotel polite helpfull room modern clean big enough three us bathroom nice big comfortable hotel renovated one year ago everything looks new stylish location hotel central next highlights paris come back hotel without doubt

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: wmccorma
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights hotel clean beautiful location pretty good 5 mins away rer station 10 mins metro room size ok cannot expect much paris come back stay hotel lady reception desk helpful showing us use metro direction

Reviews.Title: “Great location, decent rooms”
Reviews.Author: Expat_in_UK113
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel loved hotel renovated 2009 immaculate condition staff great always helpful wonderful location next luxembourg garden st germain area easy access anywhere else paris terrific restaurants neighborhood several within one block hotel au louis la le coffee shop would definitely go back would recommend types visitors things would note first room stayed double superior king size bed closet hang clothes thus kept clothes travel suitcases second shower every morning soaked bathroom floor bathroom way finally breakfast hotel 14 euros per person may bit steep coffee juice cold cereal croissants convenient used 34 time

Reviews.Title: “perfect location to see Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: helenawesome
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed recent stay hotel du luxembourg hotel well cared decorated clean nice one larger rooms paris double room single rooms looked quite small quiet hotel nice side street steps away hustle bustle st latin also stones throw away gardens staff friendly helpful breakfast good

Reviews.Title: “check it out!!”
Reviews.Author: rodtrishmcb
Reviews.Content: really liked hotel thought design foyer area wonderful rooms clean well catered nice feeling slept like baby great location want explore restaurants around course fabulous du luxembourg really nice part paris ran tourists rooms bit dark slightly would wonderful painted colour hint hint breakfast ok 13 euros youd better run cafe highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not quite spot on...”
Reviews.Author: The_new_Mrs_Hey
Reviews.Content: long hard hotel first trip paris one hotel rooms small expensive paris looked hotel prices affordable decided upgrade us junior deluxe suite room beautiful bathroom large complaint used air couldnt seem cool room sleeping could however open windows quiet everyone worked front desk dinner suggestions didnt eat breakfast fact never even saw many cafes restaurants close hotel loved location cant wait go back

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: dean00_0
Reviews.Content: stayed lovely little hotel 4 days located relatively quiet street notice staying middle paris located 300 meters rer luxembourg b airport excited would go daughter 1 years went really well hotel staff always helpful breakfast good hotel well positioned attractions shops everything within walking distance one thing say hotel deserves praise others given site among best hotel experiences

Reviews.Title: “Superb location - good and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: a_167
Reviews.Content: wife stayed nice hotel six nights weather bad week newly renovated hotel perfect located next lovely jardin du luxembourg latin quarter stayed junior suite spacious though breakfast buffet small excellent staff friendly helpful definitely stay next time paris

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Cyberlady
Reviews.Content: solo traveller quite often faced fact pay lot get poor rooms andor service also difficult find capital city nice rooms decent price must say hotel du luxembourg clean nice room big enough one person nice service decent price happy choose hotel next stay paris

Reviews.Title: “perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Maria_Cappilla
Reviews.Content: comfortable hotel good location opposite gardens luxembourg central shopping site seeing stayed several times hotel refurbished chic

Reviews.Title: “Short Break”
Reviews.Author: shane w
Reviews.Content: booked hotel several trip advisor real gem hotel moment arrived made feel welcome nothing much trouble room good size good decor lovely bathroom location good good restaurant couple doors away breakfast hotel plenty cafes close could sit people watch really liked hotel would certainly recommend book visit paris

Reviews.Title: “Please don't waste your time and money here. There are much better and inexpensive options nearby on Dam Square.”
Reviews.Author: hello123Jk
Reviews.Content: nice room comfortable bed clean spacious bathroom good breakfast perfect location nice people

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic break”
Reviews.Author: katrina o
Reviews.Content: loved decoration room nice wall light blue brown hotel entirely renovated comfortable bathroom modern clean hotel lobby welcoming television large appreciate calm hotel street time close 3 minutes walk restaurants shopping streets

Reviews.Title: “Let down by the terrible rooms.”
Reviews.Author: AlistairRobertson61
Reviews.Content: central situation prepared use taxi public transportation rental car get around travelling two small children stayed suite nice room families short walk small good 20 min walk area several local restaurants breakfast included bit boring ok say hotel better groups rather families travelling children

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great service! (detailed review)”
Reviews.Author: Auzeen
Reviews.Content: often stay madrid business usually travel city hotel visit everything wanted short business trip comfortable friendly great pillows working air con didnt feel ripped rushed sound instead traffic staying

Reviews.Title: “Wet and Windy but great fun”
Reviews.Author: Auburnaura
Reviews.Content: centrally located hotel since needed part madrid location quiet area perfect frankly surprised stylish comfortable room including comfortable chair reading watching tv good bed nice thick towels generous shower everything worked well friendly bar red wine ordered good quality right temperature fairly priced left early cannot comment breakfast learn later hotel restaurant good reputation

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location but average hotel”
Reviews.Author: MissTwizz
Reviews.Content: first time visited north madrid must say enjoyed stay liked quiet residential neighborhood hotel located

Reviews.Title: “Worth the money”
Reviews.Author: AceV
Reviews.Content: stay regularly business say great modern inside good food friendly staff make good place stay great visiting centre bit taxi ride

Reviews.Title: “An Average Hotel in an Amazing Location”
Reviews.Author: Einat G
Reviews.Content: great trip amsterdam enjoyed stay hotel amsterdam de roode leeuw center well located really recommend travel amsterdam hotel accommodation

Reviews.Title: “An Average Hotel in an Amazing Location”
Reviews.Author: Greta G
Reviews.Content: weekend 3 week european business trip choose hotel based price 200 location 700 metres central station right dam square booked room requested room facing damrak checked extremely pleased room recently remodeled large european standards standard room quiet considering faced major street checked mentioned two things front desk staff first sick interested finding second needed 10 days worth laundry time got room calling let know would come hotel 5pm 125 euros could walk 15 minutes would 50 euros leaving walk gave map place around corner would wash dry laundry euros say staff hotel friendly cheerful went way help extremely grateful pay hotel combined location staff hotel steal

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for our stay!”
Reviews.Author: Beachmom
Reviews.Content: good location central main attractions arrival greeted us checked us friendly quick efficient smoking room expected quite small tiny bathroom clean tea coffee making facilities arent best room tired dated old looking however hotel lobby nice mediocre best clean however certain time night hotel lobby raining door almost good ten minutes body front desk didnt even get apology much friendlier staff day rather night make sure visit anne franks house mcdonalds charge using toilets even youve eaten

Reviews.Title: “Overall I would recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: fmilinaz
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel friends best location amsterdam close services attractions staff great quiet comfortable rooms smallish acceptable best value found amsterdam definitely use hotel visit amsterdam well done keep great value quality

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in a top location”
Reviews.Author: Suitcase_Packer
Reviews.Content: great location amsterdam short walk train station maybe miles right next dam square outside red light district room easily big enough 2 people clean beds comfortable problems temp room room located side facing damrak street busy road figured wed hear something overnight couldnt hear anything could hear people hotel doors big deal eat breakfast hotel wanted explore city streets find pancake

Reviews.Title: “just perfect”
Reviews.Author: maryCyprus
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay amsterdam booked hotel based trip advisor reviews location right beside dam square 700 central station perfect location people travelling tour view amsterdam staff reception helpful efficient rooms small side comfortable sit hotel day smoking non smoking rooms rooms cleaned everyday facilities modern mini bar kettle tea coffee available beds comfortable total hotel met reviews written thank hotel amsterdam lovely city break deserve good reviews

Reviews.Title: “If you like to be in the middle of it all, this is the place.”
Reviews.Author: evy44044
Reviews.Content: booked online christmas got good deal stay two nights amsterdam hotel looked recently renovated room offered clean modern spacious en suite bathroom also modern clean room mini bar television safe european english plug sockets lucky id forgotten adapter air conditioning location hotel could better situated right next dam square within 5 minutes walk central station

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good”
Reviews.Author: matshanssen
Reviews.Content: really wanted love de roode leeuw read earlier reviews didnâ€™t get good start booked hotel cheap 3 night break requested smoking room arrived around half husband able check straight nice nice fact would cost 45 euros extra smoking room mentioned time booking fair enough thought make clear probably charge extra cleaning rooms got room though smell stale smoke overwhelming topped air marks walls kettle didnâ€™t work bottom mini bar dirty felt bit left bags went lunch returning couple hours later smell unbearable went reception ask could switch nonsmoking room conveniently double rooms available end chose upgrade superior room extra 75 euros would pay 45 anyway reception staff friendly helpful speaking excellent english able view superior room must say superior room lovely recently refurbished twice size standard room great view bath â€“ really couple minor points tv rather far away comfortable bed good selection channels though lit mirror definite plus hair dryer â€“ hard get right hotel definitely worth extra additional expense donâ€™t forget city tax either didnâ€™t eat hotel finding 15 euros bit steep buffet breakfast restaurant look busy times day overall although stay pleasant enough found hotel lacking atmosphere â€“ small reception bar area would probably choose somewhere bit homely visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Good option in the best location”
Reviews.Author: BjÃ¸rn F
Reviews.Content: brilliant hotel rooms ok uk tv channels like bbc1 refreshing shower good selection mini bar lol location central get restaurant downstairs good food stop treat wont regret

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, shame about the little brdrooms!”
Reviews.Author: skindiverDublin
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 night break jan 2012 main selling point location right middle everything around 510 mins centraal station upgraded recently renovated junior suite lovely large balcony looking noisy double glazing etc front desk service helpful especially girl cant remember name unfortunately downside breakfast average best

Reviews.Title: “convenient but very busy”
Reviews.Author: newtravellerdan
Reviews.Content: de roode leeuw hotel amsterdam really nice hotel perfect location within walking distance many places like madame anne frank museum also red light district staff really friendly room totally adequate bit ok breakfast good bit 15 euros still would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: DirkDeMe
Reviews.Content: hi got back splendid 7 days stay place nothing positive impressions kindly upgraded superior wasnt spacious still functional well organized enough space always important time cosy comfortable speaking comfort bed wonderful bed im still great heart action close popular sight staff attentive friendly housekeeping immaculate thanks everything back ps may consider putting shower curtain glass bathroom prevent water floor

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel, but not quite 4* standard”
Reviews.Author: CousinJack
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights december staff friendly welcoming arrival room adequate knew rooms sleeping close dam square

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in excellent location”

Reviews.Content: stayed beginning december 2011 4 nights first hotel expensive quality price charge services provide old hotel old outdated building built weekend claimed charging euros night believe sort kind charge first floor renovation put called superior room joke 2nd floor price payed could hear construction jazz jack room asked put different room heard sold 2nd floor floor superior rooms front desk night person named get job club something like lacks basic talking plane rude lady works mornings called manager better either tell want different room comment services talk would ignore lady cant name correctly told one morning cant talk issue room charges busy though front desk empty guests time rooms really small cramped even called superior rooms hallways real narrow could hear foot step noises guests floor guests next door clearly tvs shame real small bathrooms absolutely space everything little bathrooms toilet seat corner space sit something hanging head bathroom sinks small bathtub half size glass water bathroom floor shower heating rooms takes forever start 15 min claim hot air comes different systems temp would claim go 28 degree would freezing night cold amsterdam winter weather hotels vicinity much less inexpensive hotel room rate right square 100 euros night basic services hotel provided hotel charging 80 euros night another bigger hotel nearby cant remember name charging 120 euros night rip even saw 4 star hotels weekend charged euros night nice thing hotel location dont want ripped want better value money plenty nicer much inexpensive options vicinity please dont believe website shower place

Reviews.Title: “i love this hotel...will always stay there in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Gary1968_11
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel fantastic location 5 minute walk station local everything rooms spotlessly clean beds really comfortable abit small big enough couple food fantastic staff helpfull friendly ive ever come across really nothing much trouble n always smiling polite fantastic relaxing break brilliant manager thank making break enjoyable staff credit lovely hotel back

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in a location that can't be beat”
Reviews.Author: kengj
Reviews.Content: pity memory red terrible rooms areas smallish hotel rather good location damrak immediately next dam square well placed pretty much cities main main tram lines run past front door also ten minute drag railway staff one exception polite helpful restaurant quite upmarket pricey seperate bar felt paying top dollar using bar accomodation rooms small would expect also need fair starting meantime find room badly furnished uncomfortable beds bathroom narrow use facilities would red fabulous little hotel open bedroom door may return future completed done staff maybe shouldnt hold much time return saved enough stay palace much better

Reviews.Title: “Still love this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cath_Ian6480
Reviews.Content: prior booking hotels looking big bathroom good location affordable great thing tripadvisor see others taken read small rooms bathrooms comes shower tub contacted de roode leeuw regarding got back following day provide room tub fairly large sized husband booked superior room emailed positive back taking larger room assured happy weeks stay arrived 11am room yet ready took luggage advised us wait 23 hours luckily lots area something eat walked around bit came back 1pm room ready room opinion superior said 2 twin beds pushed together clean sheets pillows side side tables bed bugs happy say none even behind beds dust free wardrobe shelves move coffee around make room 2 chairs middle table looked old take necessary update furniture broke desk chair charged electronic 2 balconies 2 windows long curtains drapes live like like room dark drapes really helped view direction towards monument street department store across drapes open room bright open heater heat didnt go far kept room tv local channels channels english mini bar able store water least 2 separate bathrooms modern looking loved floor cold stepped one bathroom long sink toilet theres window small fan recommend bringing air big loads lol shaped sink tub separate shower absolutely loved tub took bath twice dont even take baths home theres window far open close stick hidden corner shower door get water going around floor place towel right next rest dry quickly room also offers pair slippers helps keep feet dry sizes bathrooms generous definitely worth upgrade superior rooms room also provided didnt use coffeetea machine safe air conditioner carpet dark looked fairly clean remember stains expect carpet stay clean guests per year satisfied cleanliness room read reviews noise coming streets yes tram stop right front hotel go every 2 minutes day night course sound residents tourists walk got used first day construction floor beneath us informed upon arrival drilling didnt usually happen late morning shouldnt hotel room exploring city looking restaurants add came across de roode leeuw restaurant times popular spot every time walk packed recommended make reservations tried breakfast buffet worth lots options kinds drinks choose waitress nice even recommended things us last 2 days got incredibly sick asked room service possible order restaurant didnt want step foot outside theres separate menu room service happy accommodate service nice mean dont expect give world chat wanted call restaurant see time closed couldnt figure use phone room asked front desk call helpful housekeeping stop middle hall ask need anything room refreshed check informative explained much deposit took much keeping detail much getting back card right away best part location could believe easy walk everywhere wanted literally center amsterdam previous europe trip experience always spread know hard get lot done short period time europe requires lots walking actually able finish week things 4 days location picked dam plaza tourist shopping areas right next trams goes major tourist spots like van gogh rijksmuseum centraal station 10 minute walk away red light 5 minutes away nine streets right behind hotel takes leidseplein flower markets jordaan 10 minutes away lots restaurants near also good times started raining pretty badly able run back hotel hours come back sky first days pretty jet good go morning come back take afternoon nap night safe area overall perfect location really enjoyed staying hotel ever go back amsterdam staying try anything ask room lol sorry review really want show future guests great hotel youll pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location”
Reviews.Author: hazy_amersham
Reviews.Content: steps transportation steps shopping area steps red light right dam sq rooms big clean free wireless internet else need compared hotels value money great

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very clean and friendly staff.”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed winter city break 3 nights wanted somewhere vicinity de dam stayed several times amsterdam used standard hotels hotel amsterdam definitely gem find arrived tram stop directly outside hotel received genuinely warm welcome reception staff booked superior room wanted step basic pleasantly surprised wife celebrating anniversary upgraded imagine one junior suites huge recently refurbished bathroom bath separate shower separate ensuite seating area amount space corner hotel building full length balcony doors facing almost onto dam square however double glazing none street noise ever bothered us distant trams outside added great amsterdam atmosphere love bed comfortable little firm slept well unlike reviewers experience problems open shower cubicle bathroom using common sense flooding floor easily avoided bathroom beautifully done contemporary style fantastic heating criticism large sink found using mirror problem inconvenience came equipped ipad could easily keep connected via wifi room surprisingly speedy considering free room spotless condition return hotel afternoon requests wifi extra blanket even thermostat use met faultless pleasant response reception staff could excellent service received even hello left returned hotel day hotel breakfasts amsterdam price pay cafes around city usual chose find little canal watch world go therefore cannot comment quality breakfast offered hotel came hotel certain expectations found far understand rooms currently refurbished anything go sure rest disappoint one last note really impressed standard found visit end november manager responded every comment placed clearly shows management interested customers think end day keep good work look forward return

Reviews.Title: “greatest hotel”
Reviews.Author: gregmisty
Reviews.Content: stayed couple months ago hotel staff friendly hotel situated double room clean bathroom really classy definitely recommend hotel visiting amsterdam staying hotel really great experience

Reviews.Title: “An OK hotel in a central location”
Reviews.Author: ferry41
Reviews.Content: hotel located dam spot amsterdam basically hotel average room tiny 12 feet price little bit higher hotels first time amsterdam hotel good choice u already know city better hotels lower prices

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tyler12
Reviews.Content: husband stayed month ago 5 day vacation checked many hotels online settled place best location money boutique hotel right bustling dam square walk practically anywhere city ton bars around hotel okay thought hotel staff friendly accommodating since staying 5 days upgraded us bigger room still two twin beds pushed together know hotel rooms europe small id hate see size room also weird smell like musty wet smell even bought try get would replace carpet fresh coat paint would help lot bathrooms updated great shower small shower door little strange water gets floor perhaps weird smell big grocery store called albert heijn block away awesome strangely dont accept credit cards would stay probably would pay little try stay hotel next door since nicer youre looking affordable hotel european standards anyway ideal location deal super nice maybe place

Reviews.Author: Babyroo1971
Reviews.Content: staying de roode leeuw 10 times tell enough rooms range tiny seriously big take suite last 2 times regular small rooms come bit shock stayed hotel amsterdam adequate find hotel located central often take train airport centraal station walk hotel luggage rooms tidy clean bathrooms adequate great compared american hotel bathrooms staff friendly helpful de

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Rhooseboy
Reviews.Content: reading others reviews paid little superior room could extra space room big comes king bed tv free internet using ethernet mini fridge kettle coffee maker nice bathroom bathroom wood door shower funny got glass part way bathroom floor big deal though front desk nice hotel right center town perfect place go exploring didnt try restaurant looked expensive tons places nearby grab breakfast lunch dinner small grocery store things bring back room note hotel book room says policy bringing food back hotel theres room put things fridge hotel already offers also claim throw food see got around never room serviced room quiet double soundproof windows great receive lot english channels overall good place stay price

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: abcdeLondon
Reviews.Content: hotel great location right street central close dam square giving us 2 rooms next 15 year old twins would close air conditioned mini fridge room even let us check 1pm since arrived early exhausted trip complaint would small bathrooms modern clean extremely small employees front desk extremely nice helpful would definately recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “a shabby and dirty 2 star hotel .”
Reviews.Author: joharp
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed exceptional experience heart dam square im sure well back

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rubenportland
Reviews.Content: enjoy centre everything find hotel short steps away dam square although rooms tiny without window open quiet peaceful get room rear checkin fast bed reasonable size comfortable bathroom almost glass door television situated cannot really bed room safe fire located directly outside window room tax hit end stay addition cost room thought bit much paid advance one mentioned extra fee said wasnt something nevertheless felt informed booking security good hotel opens right onto main street access lift via key card reception area immediately front lift seating area lobby small small beautiful staff knowledgable helpful

Reviews.Title: “We'll Be Back...can't wait!”
Reviews.Author: Lily53Ny
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel amsterdam short break staff friendly helpful rooms nice clean couldnt ask better location stayed nonsmoking room could smell smoke curtains didnt eat restaurant food shops nearby would definitely return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable Stay”
Reviews.Author: plod1127
Reviews.Content: great hotel tram station front near left got nice chips great shop sweets shopping right place always people behind street shops food whatever greatly located specially u sense great coffee near near case

Reviews.Title: “Best location in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: DarylGeneral
Reviews.Content: great hotel fantastic location situated close dam square thought may noisy quiet peaceful clean room bathroom tv channels english good room warm though thick blankets however slightly air con room small didnt bother us mostly exploring amsterdam bad thing room bathroom doors luckily saw funny side however might bit awkward friends family visiting overall stay enjoyable nice hotel near centre amsterdam 4th time amsterdam return likely look staying roode leeuw

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and central - I enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: Kiwi_55er
Reviews.Content: cant ask better local clean room consider smart tv remote impossible clean room luxury

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good interior but smell of cigarettes”
Reviews.Author: marchellica
Reviews.Content: booked double take single arrived smallest room ever seen entire life see awful expensive double second night perfectly wasnt good experience overall breakfast awful value nice fresh customer service friendly either avoid

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Location, Great Hotel, Fabulous Staff”
Reviews.Author: carrie_i_NZ
Reviews.Content: important hotel location safety cleanliness cost de roode mark perfect location walking distance central station one block tram station hotel safe front door security 247 main street lots restaurants traffic clean especially nice bathrooms good value internet included rooms adequate theres much amsterdam need sleep front office staff friendly helpful go stay enjoy breakfast good great try convenient find good breakfasts around neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Warm staff with warm attitude”
Reviews.Author: Isaac-Pearl
Reviews.Content: delightful helpful staff hotel rather old fashioned perfectly good enough city break dam square trams stopping front behind hotel make excellent centre tour amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Rude staff and "couldnt care" attitude”
Reviews.Author: RoosterNEScotland
Reviews.Content: close city smoking rooms quite nice building service absolutely weekend amsterdam always nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: robbo81
Reviews.Content: larger corner room back hotel delightful street noise problem single elevator rather slow staff friendly helpful would highly recommend hotels restaurant also department store right across street de great etc excellent buffet style restaurant huge delicious selection foods numerous stations

Reviews.Title: “Great facade - poor quality rooms unless you pay more and more”
Reviews.Author: acmee001
Reviews.Content: last years perfect stay de roode went back birthday pleased got smaller room clean cosy nice view street dam square late mornings found clean towels door every day nice big bed bathroom small small needed toilet shower sink first morning water pressure felt bit poor got better stay room also kettle highly us drinking people decided stay another night like last year got room without problems staff excellent friendly helpful even come bell 34 nothing smile day checked offered leave bags went breakfast picked heading train call hotel amsterdam coming back long celebrate thank lovely stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location - worth paying extra for the large room”
Reviews.Author: Goonerette
Reviews.Content: fantastic location right dam square tram stop directly front hotel room first offered liking rather small view moved problem corner room overlooking damrak room good room ask hotel says management good client facing staff good housekeeping works little face sometimes hard compact building breakfast good beds comfortable wifi free decoration clean tidy perhaps need year two season 2011 carpet edges cracked one lift needs steep stairs makes wait worthwhile work sound problems damrak dam sq busy areas dont expect silence

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: sunshine0701
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights like amsterdam hotels small room basics tv mini bar safe property clean safe staff extremely friendly location top notch close tourist attractions main central station tram stop breakfast buffet also impressive

Reviews.Title: “Great Location. Clean rooms, friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: EBach_SanDiego
Reviews.Content: stayed week loved every minute hotel beautiful clean staff friendly upgraded larger room worth every penny bed fantastic hotel located spot near fun parts town would stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Alfiepoo
Reviews.Content: room ok though problems bathroom design water ran shower area rest bathroom chair loose staff friendly breakfast good selection breads etc location central near dam square good location shopping department store across street street bit seedy busy

Reviews.Title: “Staff very kind”
Reviews.Author: Sherwood-Tenerife
Reviews.Content: partner found hotel nice good central location within easy walking distance central station staff welcoming friendly smoking room smell guess expected wish housekeeping would keep windows open guests allow smell go theyd complaining paid approx per night weekend bit steep compared quality wed get home think average amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Going to Amsterdam? Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: aky13
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 days recently celebrate 40th birthday upon arrival found reception staff friendly even wishing happy birthday room clean bathroom extremely luxurious reception staff helpful even gave us directions places interest encounter problem hot water one day broken keyboard internet use within 5 minutes us reception bell boy manager hand help problem early alarm call even booking taxi airport made return home thank everyone made stay one remember ever

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: JudyVirginiaBeach
Reviews.Content: stopped 3 nights would certainly return positives location situated 400 yards central station 50 yards dam square makes perfect base explore staff really friendly staff helped queries rooms clean free wifi room negatives location would ensure facing damrak busy street rooms unsure glass door bathroom room relatively small think expect amsterdam could open bathroom door fully bed located way shower pressure great milk available tea coffee small issues staff used room base im sure would dealt required overall would definately stop would recommend hotel others location staff cleanliness great shall look stop next visit

Reviews.Title: “Great stay...staff...PERFECT!!!”
Reviews.Author: Worker77
Reviews.Content: reserved 7 front desk staff offer warmer room could get 46 members wait staff restaurant even us never mind provide menu take order experience much checked second night moved next door advise much better

Reviews.Title: “The Best of Dam Square”
Reviews.Author: LoveAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: dont stay husband booked de roode leeuw two night stay 30th october checked october paying extra money change earlier flights staff reception nice told us checked given us free upgrade dont know arrived early wait go room didnt mind wish could seen room earlier could walked straight found another hotel sofa room full disgusting stains carpet even member staff room provided clean sheets cover chairs could sit filthy bathroom floor around toilet stained location great good thing hotel apart leaving

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff. 1st Class Location”
Reviews.Author: 55Minny
Reviews.Content: thank hotel amsterdam wonderful visit amsterdam staying last 20 years always enjoy stay cannot say enough staff care kindness shown us

Reviews.Title: “A great "trip"”
Reviews.Author: Sonro
Reviews.Content: checked yesterday week hotel roode leeuw first time city pleased location well warm welcome received room clean comfortable 3rd floor received excellent service housekeeping staff indeed shower floor holiday assumed european plumbing thing informed issue resolved time come back staff desk pleasant willing help us directions information hours time experienced smoking went use internet 1st floor smoking rooms lobby floor stayed odor room used internet quiet secure however wished another computer could used want check email time time check things home area often occupied seemed like 2 people always unfortunately didnt get around eating restaurant get room service early one morning pleased choices food provided check breeze great time chatting staff waited taxi airport long hotel amsterdam really enjoyed stay see next year

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: KristofKnokke_Heist
Reviews.Content: loved hotel location fantastic less 100 metres dam square 10 min walk train station people use travelling airport hotel busy street damrak want view probably get street noise room away front quiet clean however like european city hotel rooms unless pay big money small reason could rate hotel 5 star although cant helped serious concern day thing happy cost using internet expensive want use 5 mins print boarding pass found internet cafe street charging 14 price staff excellent courteous friendly never kept us waiting visit amsterdam staying hotel amsterdam leeuw

Reviews.Title: “Great Value For Money”
Reviews.Author: DCHV
Reviews.Content: came honeymoon staff management fantastic really acknowledged honeymoon went way accommodate us best manner possible read reviews place great location still pleasantly surprised central best places amsterdam offer plus short walk central train station instantly felt like part amazing city culture stay next time go amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Dissappointed - european 4* is not to my expectations”
Reviews.Author: Kat_wwe
Reviews.Content: time checked slightly early received friendly helpful service two nights room especially facilities functional clean easy get centraal station suitcase via trams travel damrak would stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Central Location, Clean & Friendly Service”
Reviews.Author: simplesimon70
Reviews.Content: met expectation great location within dam square need walk citys attractions room interior looks brand new breakfast included pay internet connection get free nearby one thing hotel must fix smell probably alley room although room nonsmoking room free still smelly

Reviews.Title: “A perfect stay in a very nice hotel with comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: MennoNetherlands
Reviews.Content: loved hotel booked day arrived amsterdam still got decent rate arrived given free upgrade superior room made feel really welcome room great little small clean tidy window overlooking rather dingy alleyway fault hotels stayed 3 nights stored luggage last day charge location wonderful one main streets really central everything restaurant downstairs also room service great little priced staff extremely helpful gave great directions assistance needed would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, medium quality...”
Reviews.Author: kathie_gemi
Reviews.Content: give de roode leeuw 5 stars rate reasons first important hotel staff staff really really professional much questions needs price second location hotel located central place amsterdam walk almost place amsterdam youre planning trip amsterdam would great choice

Reviews.Title: “Reservation - What's One Of Those?”
Reviews.Author: jovialmonkeybusiness
Reviews.Content: expensive booked british maybe anyway place really two star best tiny room looking inside front desk staff rude unhelpful

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, Excellent Staff!”
Reviews.Author: Parrot_Girl84
Reviews.Content: returned 4 day break amsterdam stayed de roode leeuw hotel centrally located short walk central station within easy walking distance main attractions madame red light district etc staff polite courteous room 3rd floor clean tidy daily room cleaning room small everything need ensuite small modern decor shower area small cannot shower without flooding entire room heat lamp provided dry floor ensuite complaint hotel otherwise really pleased stay hotel also restaurant located ground floor never ate staying room basis

Reviews.Title: “i cant see what everyone is complaining about,its fab!!!”
Reviews.Author: jayney456
Reviews.Content: wonderful restaurant great service however room experienced hidden centre hotel another wall view window noise room listening moving room generally well equipped standard features room small incredibly stuffy unless aircon time place spend week visiting amsterdam course upgrade 25 euro night seems part plan would recommend hotel unless assured room window view access fresh air go modern hotel plaza mistake wont make way reported concerns management writing guess response even broken chair sure whether norm simply get

Reviews.Title: “Not what we expected at all...we left our first night there to a different HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: MefoandMeho
Reviews.Content: extremely friendly staff go way helpful husband spent 3rd wedding anniversary hotel even supplied bottle wine help us celebrate knew staying exceptionally large room 1st floor paid small amount extra upgrade booking well worth extra money room little dated terms looks clean spacious would recommend hotel anyone wanting stay amsterdam location great top dam square within walking distance everywhere want visit

Reviews.Title: “Cozy, Friendly Hotel in the Heart of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: MiskyB
Reviews.Content: great location rooms small expected considering location staff could nicer

Reviews.Title: “Location, Staff, and Room A++”
Reviews.Author: 5EI8008
Reviews.Content: hotel appear clean carpets stained cigarette night heard noises wall sounded like sort insect bed two single beds pushed together one spring middle back bathroom efficient special also found got home extra charge credit card given receipt still trying figure charged must say front desk staff incredibly helpful informative bright spot stay hotel inexpensive guess get pay

Reviews.Title: “In the middle of it all”
Reviews.Author: greenwireless
Reviews.Content: arrived back fantastic trip amsterdam hotel great location 10 mins walk station easy access main tourist areas staff extremely helpful friendly cant really fault hotel rooms clean bathrooms lovely even left laundry bag clean towels maid couldnt get room lie would definately book hotel

Reviews.Title: “Ups and Downs”
Reviews.Author: SherriD555
Reviews.Content: arrived amsterdam 4 find reserved overbooked however arranged room price hotel amsterdam room fine couple traveling us said nice staff especially nice offered without asked 11 checkout time thought might tired next morning although would pay standard price see web hotel price paid excellent

Reviews.Title: “Avoid It!”
Reviews.Author: NancyArmstrong
Reviews.Content: first must advise wife generally stay 5 star hotels need want room service appreciate paying fancy lobby hotels clean provide rooms private bathroom facilities conveniently located public transportation expensive taxis helpful staff always plus hotel de roode leeuw red reason rated sleep quality 4 instead 5 queen king sized bed prefer larger bed rated room 4 5 tiny however unless pay lot european hotel room tiny get almost everywhere perhaps best people knowledgeable helpful courteous friendly cannot beat transportation convenience hotel one citys tram lines stopped right front hotel entrance de roode leeuw located main street actually short walk main train station since traveled amsterdam train convenient furthermore starting point canal tours front train station slightly closer hotel hotel also within walking distance many sights wonderful city recommend stroll red light district even happily married partner quite interesting hotel restaurant many interesting shops nearby like touristy stuff

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Amsterdam is a wonderful place to stay in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: rubenportland
Reviews.Content: husband booked hotel location chose well hotel close shopping restaurants trams run right outside hotel noise could problem one hear lot square one also walk central station check quick staff friendly enough overly answer questions sign hotel stating allowed else charged 100 euros immediately room overlooking de department store similar go eat restaurant 5th floor good cafe located 1st floor beds similar twin beds suited needs although used king sized free wifi internet costly breakfast buffet 15 euros stayed week superior room

Reviews.Title: “well managed Dutch hotel next to Dam square”
Reviews.Author: fabmc
Reviews.Content: staff extremely helpful central location rooms renovated aware internet payment though smokers advise book smoking room reasonable location saves lot tram travel

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel Amsterdam - Fab Accommodation”
Reviews.Author: MissHappyPants
Reviews.Content: upon entering hotel greeted friendliness professionalism staff staff 5star hotel 5star location 5star restaurant 5star everything hotel 5star definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Very Central”
Reviews.Author: Cedric_The_Cat
Reviews.Content: centrally located hotel ideal base anywhere amsterdam got train airport walked station 10 minutes got hop hop ticket water bus convenient easy staff made point friendly room clean everything could want except nice view back good bit though never heard noise street lot guests seem complain glass door bathroom problem least glass bathroom rather small loo sink close nevertheless huge complaint found expensive budget least central find alternatives breakfasts meals easy walking distance pleasant stay would definitely recommend others

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good hotel”
Reviews.Author: guy2706
Reviews.Content: helpful friendly staff lovely hotel clean tidy great room service bathroom satisfactory comfy bed good selection movies ages expensive eat however location brilliant many restaurants doorstep 510 minute walk nearest coffee shop red light district although room onto street woken early kept late however time slept kept great place want experience real amsterdam way life still able get back comfy bed warm room tasty selection minibar careful returning coffee shops add towels always clean bed always made clean sheets going back summer 2010 cannot wait recommend highly anyone brief heart everything gives right touch make amsterdam holiday perfect

Reviews.Title: “fantastic location!”
Reviews.Author: scunnybunny78
Reviews.Content: people reception kind polite help problems search info asking restaurant also kind polite food excellent really enjoyed vacation

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, but average hotel”
Reviews.Author: stickyfingers85
Reviews.Content: wife returned long weekend amsterdam stayed two nights hotel amsterdam de roode leeuw stayed many city centre hotels hotel compared location hotel perfect close everything transport restaurants shopping etc booked double room got problem whatsoever city centre hotels tend expected entrance reception small perfectly adequate stayed room experience room exceeded expectations plenty space excellent facilities comfortable bed clean bathroom â€“ magnificent obviously newly highest standards breakfast eat restaurant cannot comment quality however say restaurant pleasantly appointed menu traditional dutch fare appeared reasonably priced fact every evening extremely busy room rate included breakfast consisted hot cold buffet relatively modest selection perfectly adequate comment would appeared bit expensive side nothing compare experience similar hotels uk however breakfast included rate issue staff reception restaurant helpful courteous times overall hotel offered average value money made pleasant weekend

Reviews.Title: “Good clean hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: Dsleazy
Reviews.Content: spent days de roode leeuw long weekend break first trip amsterdam read good reviews place would meet expectations firstly plus side location hotel good virtually next dam square convenient many central attractions location busy hours easy walk station red light district anne franks house cruise tour getting around city convenient hotel negative side disappointed condition room traveled around world seen sorts 4 hotels one feel lived status decor hotel outside small lobby felt dated room peeling wallpaper felt dark old fashioned fixtures bed covers aspect air conditioning neighbouring building pleasant least could kind see bit felt bit booked trip partner romantic getaway felt quality room far worse 4 hotel visited money would expected better nevertheless tried spend little time possible room plus side bathroom appeared recently contemporary fixtures though extremely small open wet room effect shower made horrible wet floor around toilet unpleasant standing staff friendly helpful front desk aside would reccommend hotel looking true quality get away need well located crash good getting around sure would probably suit needs anything beyond bit character charm relaxation way place maybe unlucky particular room part hotel say takes one visit make opinion sadly mine disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Good location & nice staff - But not a 4-star hotel”
Reviews.Author: J26Ottawa
Reviews.Content: hi everyone back wonderful trip amsterdam stayed hotel amsterdam say nice hotel stay staff friendly helpful rooms spotless comfortable like reviews bathrooms bit small kept lovely condition shower amazing bathrooms also lovely shower hairdryer need enough said restaurant downstairs breakfast lovely variety cereals juices breads cakes cheese ham etc cooked hotel minutes walk train station central amsterdam location perfect everyone everything within walking tram distance away wonderful hotel yes going back

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: GrimGloucestershire
Reviews.Content: staying hotel amsterdam de roode leeuw four nights christmas time birthday present boyfriend chose hotel amsterdam location must say loved walking distance everything except hard rock cafã© rooms average thought bathroom ok doors didnt bother travelling someone close might problem thought bed really comfortable clean thought housekeeping good job staff really helpful nice always smiling overall liked hotel would recommend

Reviews.Title: “wicked hotel”
Reviews.Author: wolves2100
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights hotel recently thought ok ive visited amsterdam five times past years stayed different hotels 3 4 near centraal station time expectations smoking comfort room hotel amsterdam smallest ive encountered far bathroom door fully opening bed way furniture dated easily fell desk chair could barely fit travelling solo wasnt really concerned size room dated furniture bathroom door understand others commented wouldnt like sharing windows room opened view brick wall building across whilst appreciated central location hotel every room face front fortunately view portion building windows feel sense privacy windows open heating room adequate kept noise slept well staff friendly room clean stocked usual including mini bar although 15 euro grateful option smoking room amsterdam would stay next time visit probably ill try somewhere different wouldnt staying youre clean central convenient room bed amenities ok

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Earthy_Feet
Reviews.Content: already stayed hotel july 2008 loved every minute hesitation booking return trip expecting year birthday dissapointed room rooms appear renovated since last year unfortunately better first room given small cramped glass see door toilet shower right next bed pleasant certainly comfortable sit toilet glass door partner able watch bed maybe people immediately requested change rooms due glass door issue told rooms like dissapointed previous year room perfect large enclosed door privacy room enclosed toilet tiny im 6 door sat toilet basin toilet shower room still see glass door small basin shelves area put gel etc sounds minor strange 4 star hotel overall real shame renovated rooms made feel ripped since actually paid almost time round feels lot less money location hotel superb real shame rooms value money real shame staff location could faulted staying next trip shame

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: TorTravellerToronto
Reviews.Content: reviews site hotel roode leeuw justice hotel traveling look hotels good deals based reviews expecting much hotel however arrived checked saw room extremely happy room small expect europe staff friendly courteous professional helpful met needs pay attention negative reviews hotel found extremely dissapointing people would reputation great hotel hotel setting perfect right city center approximately 510 minute walk central station attractions near shopping district right behind hotel view royal square room wonderful picturesque would recommend hotel friends family particularly parents

Reviews.Title: “Never a 4* star hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: PJScotty
Reviews.Content: stayed week aug hotel clean staff helpful friendly well room bit small smaller hotel rooms nyc ive stayed issues week stay room balcony french doors open faced street even though street view room surprisingly quiet day bathrooms bit different us shower area smaller shower curtain entire bathroom tends get wet however cleaning crew nice job cleaning bathroom daily basis many people states may used done countries well keep mind youre another country everything home would recommend staying anyone everyone centrally located smack middle heart amsterdam also tram stop right front hotel save euros walk hotel amsterdam centraal 10 min walk im really sure people left negative comments want bells hotel room pay extra 200 night front room luxury hotel rather trying cheap complaining fact establishment meeting

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: octavius
Reviews.Content: hotel one best stayed great location clean friendly helpfull staff large hotel like say marriott get personal touch unlike big corporate hotels hotel short walk train station amsterdam tram stop right outside highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Mclaren1Ireland
Reviews.Content: booked hotel expedia 10 wedding anniversary weekend trip choice pictures website looked really nice lobby hotel small efficient hotel staff courteous friendly helpful room quiet possibly worst ever seen although advertised 4 star hotel room dark poorly decorated stained walls carpet view next doors air conditioning units bathroom looked like built 10 years ago clean didnt stay find asked different room none available next day bags searched immediate area booked crown plaza streets away checked hotel amsterdam de roode leeuw within 2 hours told would refunded one two night booking want room rest head probably fine absolutely 4 star experience

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: LT170
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel ideally situated dam square smoking room however hotel staff accommodating requested moved non smoking room told us could change rooms next morning one would available nice clean room walk shower ideal location explore foot catch tram stop directly outside hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place to stay”
Reviews.Author: idmac54
Reviews.Content: careful reading tripadvisor reviews guided us hotel staff helpful professional courteous room large nicely decorated pick also location pretty loud day wasnt problem us since street noise quiet evening stores shut also say restaurant food staff stay

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, highly recomended!”
Reviews.Author: Catmatix
Reviews.Content: research tripadvisor hotel amsterdam saw good reviews bad ones plus price right package booked took booked 5 night stay also impressed hotel management responded review tripadvisor however ive realized management response youve bad experience doesnt really help youre holding bathroom smell youre wish wed extra 200 stayed somewhere else im travel try fair reviews honestly cant recommend stay one good thing think location location hotel room really canâ€™t beat hotel amsterdam itâ€™s 57 minute walk damrak central station practically dam square royal palace americans canâ€™t every write netherlands beautiful country warn stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and Location”
Reviews.Author: Marploug
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel three nights blast room ready soon arrived reception staff friendly answered questions room comfortable great view square little worried shower door curtain surprisingly fine shower great beds comfortable well didnt eat restaurant cant comment location hotel unbeatable steps dam square red light district anything would need want even left planning next trip back amsterdam well definitely staying

Reviews.Title: “Very central and friendly”
Reviews.Author: catmorri
Reviews.Content: christmas beer best christmas gift could gotten free beer hotel amsterdam maybe waiter restaurant roode returned little tray beer wine glasses ordered earlier carried steep dutch stairs third floor room wife still stairs takes lift conversation kids front desk usually race return trip second beer told waiter wife would never believe given free drink could make room beer wine glasses still full beer little bit onto wine reached floor let guard still must dutch guys feel bound amsterdam stairs itâ€™s good way keep shape waiter really seem surprised returned second glass beer perhaps beer knew hard drink one glass dutch beer seemed impressed paid cash earlier dutch guys itâ€™s easy charge room nasty drinking pay keep honest second trip spoke dutch maybe thought surprise old american reached pocket pay new glass sitting sparkling tray waiter big smile face house another wife weve returning hotel amsterdam twenty years intend twenty wonderful place like home

Reviews.Title: “Fab hotel in heart of Amsterdam!”
Reviews.Author: Jools9999
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel two nights liked management really cares tripadvisor reviews try give customers best possible service wish hotels like one location good rooms offer good european standard facilities

Reviews.Title: “luvly staff”
Reviews.Author: CahirBuddy
Reviews.Content: stayed amsterdam hotel 4 nights 4th 8th dec 2008 joy staff polite helpful room although small clean bathroom looked new lovely great position restaurant really good go back bath uk

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: DLTravel
Reviews.Content: central location tram stop right side front door easy walking distance centraal train station close red light district dam etc easy get tram walk anne franks house catch canal bus arrival shown room clearly superior twin booked via hotelscom small standard room view brick wall enquired reception showed booking much werent room booked superior rooms booked problem soon turned advantage offered us junior suite much better even share bed albeit king pillows middle elderly mother staff professional courteous looked straight onto damrak quiet thanks double glazing plenty shops close cheap food salad roll pastries drinks etc walk little bit cafes etc

Reviews.Title: “Location doesn't get any better than this!”
Reviews.Author: spongebobs_girl
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel two nights sister location divine admittedly touristy noisy area hotel 510 minutes walk everywhere central station minutes away shopping area red light district many attractions close hotel new luxurious however perfectly fine rooms clean spacious staff really nice helpful highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Top floor at the Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: JK68
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights hotel whole hotel immaculate staff courteous professional room well equipped grateful air conditioning everything room worked bathroom small shower well decorated everything full working order location could better 3 mins walk centraal station practically dam eat restaurant please take criticism didnt get round every time walked past restaurant time day either full nearly full hotel manager uk know sign good restaurant summary well run hotel clean well presented good restaurant going number criticism minor indeed welcome staff polite courteous felt little genuine however let put roode leeuw good

Reviews.Title: “great food”
Reviews.Author: Ali-Gellatly
Reviews.Content: booked hotel flight expedia 2 nights great price hotel great location walking distance train station 5 min main attractions staff friendly always welcoming rooms average really little worn clean comfortable would recommend hotel short stay really going sleep fine however please note internet access free charge tourist tax upon checkout well

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: fluffyclee
Reviews.Content: usual spent time researching good places stay tripadvisor disappointed selection amsterdam stayed hotel quite near anne frank house little far action liking albeit short walk hotel de roode leeuw red perfectly situated 30 metres dam square right heart amsterdam short walk train station main street plenty amenities close popular restaurant downstairs although didnt choose eat seemed offer good standard food clientele appeared dressed locals hotel clean tidy twin room stayed brother modern clean comfortable tv internet access safe minibar coffee making facilities plenty wardrobe space room bathroom spacious clean good powerful shower unit breakfast included case prefer go explore area find somewhere nice breakfast case found nice cafe croissant dutch jam local tax added hotel bill checked think 6 euros one nights stay prepared tight budget would definitely recommend hotel others return visit amsterdam would happy stay roode leeuw

Reviews.Title: “Most helpful staff we've found in large hotel”
Reviews.Author: dodgema
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed 5 nights august overall good experience however hotel rated 3star see good close central station red light district shopping friendly staff good water pressure showers bad room dirty stained carpet dated furniture renovations badly needed noise streets

Reviews.Title: “couldnt be more central”
Reviews.Author: janeteg
Reviews.Content: booked trip amsterdam husbands 40th group 10 made mostly family couple friends quite people please hotel well situated right heart city easy walk central station every thing easily walking distance tram system works well go bit hotel comfortable clean rooms good size sure liked glass door bathroom husband definetly didnt part complaints one party good value clean quite central great time 2008

Reviews.Title: “Rooms are So Small! Stay Somewhere Else.....”
Reviews.Author: trishDerwood
Reviews.Content: excellent location edge dam square 5 minutes walk central station v efficient link airport good well appointed bathroom etc breakfast selection rather limited particularly hot fruit asked quiet room would noisy front home citys top restaurants serving dutch cuisine well worth eating residents received discount would certainly use hotel

Reviews.Title: “Small but convenient”
Reviews.Author: sergio2008
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel amsterdam de roode leeuw really enjoyed location amazing central everything dam square central station red light district almost tram routes pass either front hotel behind hotel depending route central station walking distance 10 minutes without carrying luggage dont really know care star ratings think sort thing silly room bed clean sound windows bathroom also clean windows looked onto roof next building room cozy expected hotel centrally located compact european city tell common areas hotel indoor smoking one time odor faint problem highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price”
Reviews.Author: jallis
Reviews.Content: absolutely great location damrak right dam square easy walking distance central station makes great home base city also convenient towns near amsterdam given location near central station able get nearby 20 minutes nothing far foot tram room side south building third floor windows closed quiet enough hear outside hey amsterdam decor average good clean fine staff extremely helpful pleasant would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “great location, but exensive weekend”
Reviews.Author: melodycoolNottsUk
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel de roode leeuw 5th june sun 8th june got back 5 hrs ago first euros 2 twin comfort room 50 euros deposit minibar checked pleasant girl behind desk polite friendly made way room straight away knew wasnt going good value carpet dated throughout hallways leading slight smell rooms big swing cat dated poorly decorated dont mind small nicely set euros supposedly 4 star impressed checkout hey even charge 5 city tax per day per person god knows budget room like staff polite good location good points never million years 4 star hotel teacoffee making facilities get tea bag 1 sugar 1 coffee per day terrible hate ripped ill mention hotels stayed ok amsterdam hotel good 3star tulip inn dam square good also hope make right choice

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, small rooms”
Reviews.Content: one party six friends rooms quite small staff friendly helpful rooms front hotel may larger damrak street hotel situated dam square busy hotel central attractions hotel reception organised card gives free tram metro fares free entry attractions entry restaurants euros art good better paris didnt eat restaurant good reviews traditional dutch cuisine breakfast 13 euros found local cafes eat breakfast dont choose carefully small french cafe hotel gave good value 5 euros

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location.............!”
Reviews.Author: horseybreeze
Reviews.Content: great location damrak across road great store stones dam square walls little thin room onto stairs could hear everyone coming stairs bathroom glass door bit bizarre hey amsterdam breakfast great cereal bacon eggs much eat reception staff friendly rooms clean perfect weekend stay longer noise may begin

Reviews.Title: “a bit pricey for what it is”
Reviews.Author: mj1870
Reviews.Content: arrived home 2 night weekend stay perfect edge dam square easy walk distance central light district flower market saturday mornings anne franks hotel room superior room large large bathroom however room little tired decoration bathroom little dissapointing booked last minute choice limited reccomend week days round still busy action full full people every

Reviews.Title: “Great, can;t relaly fault the place”
Reviews.Author: Bucks'75
Reviews.Content: returned great 4 night stay amsterdam hotel central shopping attractions close station staff helpful modern clean comfortable breakfast excellent one toast wouldnt stay anywhere else visiting plan return soon planning trip great city stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Harvey871
Reviews.Content: experience hotel outstanding read room wife jr suit two french doors overlooking damrak high ceilings large room euro standards mean euros space premium restaurant fabulous service excellent would happy stay probably excellent location cat

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: ramshaw
Reviews.Content: never amsterdam picked hotel near dam square main square damrak opposite lovely stone building fact department store minutes dam square madame red light district 5 minutes away square worth wonder see hotel room spotless food beautifully decorated restaurant excellent hotel 5 minute walk amsterdam central station get train airport also canal tour boat really handy everything lots restaurants department store worth look want would highly recommend one

Reviews.Title: “Ok Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lenina
Reviews.Content: stayed mother small clean rooms linen best beds ive hotel bathroom small good free toiletries staff friendly helpful especially maid service hotel central breakfast good typical would expect amsterdam stay without doubt would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel at a great price”
Reviews.Author: CajunWave
Reviews.Content: got back spending wedding 2 flights cancelled arrived hotel day staff couldnt helped extended night didnt charged missed night also upgraded us suite placed flowers room clean room great minibar regularly stocked enjoyed breakfast stay dam 34 times year would definately stay hotel great location

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Hotel Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Sound_Diva
Reviews.Content: back amsterdam beautiful city defo stay hotel girlfriend 2 year old child couldnt made welcome friendly always smile could learn much attitude brewery defo shops shops cruise light weird anne house bad point taxi driver robbed us charging euros fare way u du choose 2 get taxi ask price make sure u c minor cant wait 2 go back
